answers.answer: Sugar once in a while is not a bog deal, as long as you don't do it every day. That's just a general health rule though. Sometimes I can drink ginger ale, but I can't stomach much sugar since I've been pregnant.
Ok thank you for letting me know !
There is a daily  200 mg of caffeine limit during pregnancy
No its not. I drink a cup of coffee and a Dr pepper or coke 12 fl oz can. That's are caffeine limit.
So i can drink coffe nd soda once in a while?

As long as you don't exceed 200-300 mg a day. Keep it to 1-2 cans if pop a day or 1-2 cups of coffee. Also drink plenty of water in between . I crave cherry coke constantly but keep it to one every few days. And I have up coffee in order to nut feel so guilty for wanting cherry coke all the time lol
I have a 20 ounce frozen cappuccino and a can of soda pretty often.You're fine.  Don't worry about it. Soda and coffee are fine to have. I have a coke everyday and my little one is healthy.

^some women are better at handling sugar than others. If you're at risk for gestational diabetes, I wouldn't risk it. It can cause a lot of difficulties during delivery, and later in your life you're more likely to develop type two diabetes. As I said, once in a while is fine, but you're doing yourself and baby a favor if you try to limit yourself.
Lol no its not, I drink soda still here and there and my baby is fine

question: Is it bad that i drank a 12oz soda today for lunch?? Im 29 weeks
title: soda
